name: Picross Test
description:
This is a short picross game I built in 4 days, it is more a test to see how they work, I have some features that I want to implement into this if I were to expand this further but I want to build some other puzzles first, just to have the code for a few puzzle ready for if I need them for a bigger project.

There are a total of seven puzzles, three of the 5x5 two of the 10x10 and one each of the 15x15 and 20x20 sizes.

You can left-click and drag the mouse to fill in tiles, or single click each tile, right-click adds across and even though the code is the same for the fill tile and cross tile the dragging does not work with the crosses, this is something that will get fixed if I work on this more.

If you play and enjoy this, make sure to follow to try out other puzzle games that I make and upload.

Donations are not necessary to play this or any of my other games currently, but if you do donate any money it will go into improving equipment, making more games and improving current games.

Thank you for checking out my game.
